reviewText: Since my daughter was 2 months old, (She's now 2) she's been enamored with this show. Now that we are overseas, this is a great series of DVD to keep her entertained. She LOVES babies and kisses the TV screen. I highly recommend.

After Buying the 6 pack to my daughter I started buying the 3 packs for baby showers, and guess what - I get nothing but compliments.

It's the best learning tool for this age group.

2 thumbs up to the guys at the BabyFirstTV channel!

BTW- it also includes 2 months free to their TV channel in the US!
